column10: The comedians on  -LBQ-  Comic Justice  -RDQ-  are hardly stuffy .

column6: There 's less lifting of alternate feet than wagging of tail feathers , which can be amusing without being especially exhilarating .
column10: As the show goes on , the dancing becomes more and more , well , subdued .
column11: -LBQ-  Kiss of the Spider Woman  -RDQ-  is a show that demands a lot of singing and dancing at the same time , which takes stamina , breath control , muscles I 've never heard of and probably as much energy as a winning run in the New York Marathon .

column6: -LBQ-  The Judas Kiss ,  -RDQ-  which is solemn without being especially serious , is a transfer of the Almeida Theater 's London production that opened in the West End in March .
column10: -LBQ-  The Invention of Love ,  -RDQ-  which was also directed by Eyre , is no less serious for being exceptionally funny .
column11: Hare 's Oscar is an interesting construct , but resolutely anti-dramatic .
